item.title: Download Map Coordinates 5.8.5
item.description: Map coordinates are a set of numerical values ​​that represent a specific location on the Earth's surface. The most common forms of map coordinates are latitude and longitude, which are used to pinpoint a location on a map. Latitude is a measure of a location's distance north or south of the equator, while longitude is a measure of a location's distance east or west of the Prime Meridian. Map coordinates can be used in a variety of applications, including navigation, land surveying,...
